grant.require: REQUIRE NONE WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0;

reader.require: REQUIRE NONE WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0;

modifier.require: REQUIRE NONE WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0;

createScript.options: ` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;

dataTables.createScript: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `recipe`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`name` tinytext,`season` seasonEnum,`mealType` mealTypeEnum,`difficulty` difficultyEnum,`prepTime` time DEFAULT '00:00:00' NOT NULL,`cookTime` time DEFAULT '00:00:00' NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ingredient`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`recipeId` int(11) NOT NULL,`mainIngredient` tinytext DEFAULT false,`quantity` double,`unit` ingredientUnits DEFAULT 'pi√®ce',`product` INT NOT NULL,FOREIGN KEY (`recipeId`) REFERENCES `recipe` (`id`),FOREIGN KEY (`product`) REFERENCES `products` (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `step`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`text` text NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `recipeSteps`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`recipeId` int(11) NOT NULL,`stepId` int(11) NOT NULL,`orderNum` int(11) NOT NULL,FOREIGN KEY (`recipeId`) REFERENCES `recipe` (`id`),FOREIGN KEY (`stepId`) REFERENCES `step` (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `products`(`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,`name` tinytext NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
